name: Master Controler
description:
the master controller for the house has gone out off control! you must fix it by collecting the requested items , but make sure you don't die.

i just found out that it is impossible to win because the battery collectible is broken and can't be picked up due to a simple bug .

if you want to fully complete the game, the last mission was to lure the monster into the room with the server to win.

once the GMTK game jam 2020 is over i will post an updated working version of the game
